## BlockDragger.pixelsToWorkspaceUnits\_() method

Convert a coordinate object from pixels to workspace units, including a correction for mutator workspaces. This function does not consider differing origins. It simply scales the input's x and y values.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected pixelsToWorkspaceUnits_(pixelCoord: Coordinate): Coordinate;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pixelCoord | Coordinate | A coordinate with x and y values in CSS pixel units. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Coordinate
